mapper.select: select count(*) as school,ifnull(sum(JZGRS),0) as teacher,ifnull(sum(XSZS),0) as student from "GP_SZZF_Q"."JYJGJBXXDJ"
select WHCD_XL,COUNT(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" GROUP BY WHCD_XL order by COUNT(*) desc
select WHCD_BYYX,COUNT(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" GROUP BY WHCD_BYYX order by COUNT(*) desc
select XB,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" group by XB
select wm_concat(distinct BXLX) as type from "GP_SZZF_Q"."JYJGJBXXDJ"

select JYJDCZGZZZ as name,sum(cast(ZXSS as int)) as total,sum(cast(ZXSS_N as int)) as nv from "GP_SZZF_Q"."XSFNJZXXSQKJBXX" where ND = #{date} group by JYJDCZGZZZ union select '小学' as name,sum(cast(ZXSS as int)) as total,sum(cast(ZXSS_N as int)) as nv from "GP_SZZF_Q"."XSFNJZXXSQKJBXXXX" where ND = #{date} union select '幼儿园' as name,sum(cast(ZYRS as int)) as total,sum(cast(ZYRS_N as int)) as nv from "GP_SZZF_Q"."XSFNJZXXSQKJBXXYRY" where ND = #{date}

select '5岁及以下' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) <= 5 union all select '6-7岁' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) >= 6 and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) < 7 union all select '7-8岁' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) >= 7 and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) < 8 union all select '8-9岁' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) >= 8 and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) <= 9 union all select '10-11岁' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) >= 10 and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) <= 11 union all select '12岁及以上' as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where SFZH is not null and YEAR(CURDATE())-CAST(SUBSTR(SFZH,7,4) AS INT) >= 12

select ifnull(tt.NAME,'其他省') as NAME ,COUNT(*) as num from (select substr(a.SFZH,1,4) as code ,b.NAME from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" a left join "GP_SZZF_Q"."BM" b on substr(a.SFZH,1,4) = b.code where a.SFZH IS NOT NULL AND substr(a.SFZH,1,4) != '1405') tt group by tt.NAME ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
select b.NAME,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" a join "GP_SZZF_Q"."BM" b on substr(a."SFZH",1,2) = b.CODE where a.SFZH is not null group by b.NAME order by count(*) desc

select '1年' as title ,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" where year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) = 1 union select '2-3年' as title ,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" where year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) = 2 or year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) = 3 union select '4-5年' as title ,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" where year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) = 4 or year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) = 5 union select '6-7年' as title ,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" where year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) = 6 or year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) = 7 union select '8-10年' as title ,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" where year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) >= 8 and year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) <= 10 union select '11-15年' as title ,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" where year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) >= 11 and year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) <= 15 union select '16-20年' as title ,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" where year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) >= 16 and year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) <= 20 union select '20年以上' as title ,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."GPSSYDWGZRYJBQKHMC" where year(curdate()) - year(to_date("CJGZSJ",'yyyy.MM')) > 20

select '小学1-2年级' as title, count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where "NJ" is not null and year(curdate()) - substr("NJ",3,4) >= 1 and year(curdate()) - substr("NJ",3,4) <= 2 union select '小学3-4年级' as title, count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where "NJ" is not null and year(curdate()) - substr("NJ",3,4) >= 3 and year(curdate()) - substr("NJ",3,4) <= 4 union select '小学5-6年级' as title, count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where "NJ" is not null and year(curdate()) - substr("NJ",3,4) >= 5 and year(curdate()) - substr("NJ",3,4) <= 6 union select '初中1-2年级' as title, count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where "NJ" is not null and year(curdate()) - substr("NJ",3,4) >= 7 and year(curdate()) - substr("NJ",3,4) <= 8 union select '初中3年级' as title, count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" where "NJ" is not null and year(curdate()) - substr("NJ",3,4) = 9

select b.NAME,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_Q"."ZXXSJBXXHZ" a join "GP_SZZF_Q"."BM" b on substr(a.SFZH,1,2) = b.CODE where SFZH is not null and length(SFZH) = 18 group by b.NAME order by count(*) desc
